mapper.select: SELECT (@rowNo:=@rowNo + 1) AS rowNo, employeeNo, happendDate, costClassificationCode, dueDate, detailedNameOrLine, stationCode, originCode, transportationCode, destinationCode, cost, remark, roundCode, CONVERT (costFile USING utf8)costFile, updateTime, createTime, updateUser FROM T020CostInfo ,(SELECT @rowNo:=0) AS rowNo WHERE yearAndMonth1 >= #{yearAndMonth1} AND yearAndMonth2 <= #{employeeNo} ORDER BY yearAndMonth
